QuestData.Title: Put a Bird on It
QuestData.Description: $n! Have you met the peachick you saved the other day?$b$b<Mylune holds up a peachick hatchling, then trills and twitters at it. She gestures to you, says your name, then continues chirping animatedly to the little bird. The two ignore you and engage in a lengthy bird-conversation, long enough to make you feel awkward. Finally the dryad turns her attention back to you.>$b$bDid you hear that? More peachicks are still trapped in the Everbloom! If you don't save them... well, you heard what will happen!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Tiny Peachick Hatchling in The Everbloom.
